a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Countries in which a woman is head of state, World, 1789 to 2022
Heads of state are the chief public representatives of their countries.
Data source: OWID based on V-Dem (v13)
Note: This is recorded on December 31 of each year.
